subject: Redesign tabs as horizontal nav bar, merge pages into context bar
body:
Move tab navigation from sidebar pill buttons to a full-width sticky
horizontal nav bar with underline-style active indicators (website
header pattern). Merge PageStrip functionality into ContextBar so
cell selector, page management, and undo/redo live in one unified
bar below the tabs. Remove standalone PageStrip from main content.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01XXnr9mDh5YJgcZndcNcsjL
title: Redesign tabs as horizontal nav bar, merge pages into context bar
